name: KnifeStruck
description:
Jackie Normans was exploring the local graveyard, when suddenly, the zombies began rising from their graves! Now Jackie must fend for himself, throwing knifes at the decaying enemies whilst dodging ghosts.

CREDITS:

KnifeStruck - Technic

Title Theme - Technic

Game Over Theme - TheMindNaut

Phase 1 Theme - HydroGene

Phase 2, 3, and 4 Themes - SketchyLogic

Controls:

W or Up Arrow = Jump

A or Left Arrow = Left

D or Right Arrow = Right

Q or Shift = Throw knife

Press any key to start the game.
